item.description:
Perdonatemi. Scrivo in inglese.

We will be meeting at Janet's around 7:00 on Saturday. She lives at 20 Walkley Road, West Hartford. Walkley is off of Farmington, east of the center. Call me on my cell phone if you get lost - 205-3715.

Unless I hear otherwise, we are expecting Paula to bring an antipasto, Peter will bring his famous meatballs and some bread, I will bring sausage and peppers, a half wheel of sharp Italian cheese, and several bottles of wine. Janet is making an hors d'oeuvre and a dolce. Carlo and his brother will be coming directly from their radio show (a bit late) so I have asked them just to bring some Italian music. Veronica and Solimar, can we count on you to bring a dessert? Let me know by email at jdelnegro@hotmail.com or call me on my cell. Any last minute attendees feel free to bring a bottle of wine.

Alora, basta con inglese. Proviamo di parlare tutto in italiano!




a presto,

John
item.name: Sabato Speciale
